item.title: Build A Static Site
item.description: This guide will help you to build a static Site with Hugo, and upload it to Internet through GitHub. Prepare Enviroment Install Git Itâ€™s strongly recommonded you to install Git, then you can use the theme repository of Hugo in GitHub, and excute git conmmond to upload the site files to GitHub. You can obtain packges and doucuments in https://git-scm.com. If you had installed it, skip this operate. Install Hugo Hugo can be installed in macOS, Windows and so on.
